title: Catt 1906 Eulogy for Susan B Anthony

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Catt makes to achieve her purpose of praising and memorializing Susan B. Anthony.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Catt makes to achieve her purpose of praising and memorializing Susan B. Anthony.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
